title: Convert video to another format
description: Converts a video from one format to another.

input_type.ts: -i input -map 0 -vf yadif -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -preset medium -crf 23 -movflags +faststart output.xxx
input_type.vob: -i input -map 0 -vf yadif -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -preset medium -crf 23 -movflags +faststart output.xxx
input_type.mxf: -i input -map 0 -c:v libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p -c:a aac -preset medium -crf 23 -movflags +faststart output.xxx

intent: I want to convert my video to another format.

title: Compress video (reduce file size)
command: -i input -vf scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -vcodec libx264 -crf 28 -preset medium -acodec aac -b:a 128k output
description: Compresses the video to balance quality and file size.
example: -i input -vf scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -vcodec libx264 -crf 28 -preset medium -acodec aac -b:a 128k output

input_type.ts: -i input -map 0 -vf yadif,scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -vcodec libx264 -crf 28 -preset medium -acodec aac -b:a 128k output
input_type.vob: -i input -map 0 -vf yadif,scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -vcodec libx264 -crf 28 -preset medium -acodec aac -b:a 128k output
input_type.mp4: -i input -vf scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -vcodec libx264 -crf 28 -preset medium -acodec aac -b:a 128k output
input_type.mov: -i input -vf scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -vcodec libx265 -crf 28 -preset medium -tag:v hvc1 -acodec aac -b:a 128k output
input_type.webm: -i input -vf scale=trunc(iw/2)*2:trunc(ih/2)*2 -pix_fmt yuv420p -vcodec libvpx-vp9 -b:v 1M -acodec libopus -b:a 128k output

intent: I want to compress my video to make it smaller / reduce its size while keeping good visual quality and compatibility.

title: Lower video resolution
description: Downscales the video to a lower output width×height. Typical targets: 4K (3840×2160) → 1080p (1920×1080), 1080p (1920×1080) → 720p (1280×720), 480p (≈854×480 or 640×480) → 360p (640×360). Specify the desired output width and height explicitly in scale=W:H.
intent: I want to reduce my video resolution to make it lighter or more compatible.

title: Remove audio track
description: Removes all audio tracks so the output contains video only.
intent: I want to remove the sound and keep only the video.

title: Trim / cut video
description: Keeps only the segment between a start time (-ss) and an end time (-to). Times can be given as HH:MM:SS(.ms) or seconds. Example: start=00:00:10, end=00:00:20 keeps 10s of video.
intent: I want to cut / trim my video to keep only a specific part between a start and end time.

title: Rotate video (90°, 180°, 270°)
description:
Rotates the video by a specific angle:
- 90° clockwise → `-vf transpose=1`
- 90° counterclockwise → `-vf transpose=2`
- 180° → `-vf transpose=2,transpose=2`
- 270° (same as 90° counterclockwise) → `-vf transpose=2`
.
intent: I want to rotate my video by 90°, 180°, or 270°, either clockwise or counterclockwise.

title: Scale video to specific dimensions
description: Resizes the video to an exact width and height.
intent: I want to resize my video to specific dimensions.

title: Crop video region
description: Crops the video to a defined rectangle (width:height:x:y) to keep only the desired area.
intent: I want to crop my video to keep only a selected area.

title: Black and white effect
description: Converts the video to grayscale (black and white) for a monochrome look.
intent: I want to turn my video into black and white.
